content: inspired by a mountain vista this textured hat features a twisted-stitch cable motif emulating the peaks and ridges of the mountains knit with two hanks of warm and soft woolstok which color will be your favorite experience level * intermediate materials * woolstok worsted 100% fine highland wool 50g/123yds 2 hanks * stitch marker * tapestry needle * cable needle finished measurments * circumference 17¾ 19½ unstretched * height 8½ 9 color shown * red rock no 1315
